split_tip: choose the amount of files split to. Default is 1.
key_password_tip: Provide either a key file or password for encryption/decryption
run_encryption_failed: Encryption failed. Check the log for details, or you can create an issue on GitHub.
run_decryption_failed: Decryption failed. Check the log for details, or you can create an issue on GitHub.
key_file_or_pwd_empty: Please choose a key file or enter a password.
key_file_and_pwd_same_time: Please choose a key file OR enter a password.
split_files_invalid: Split amount must be at least 1.
pwd_disclaimer: Note: The password is not stored, please DO NOT forget your password. If you forget your password, you will not be able to recover your images.
